name: slick-loader
description: A slick loader to use during your AJAX calls or data processing

scripts.release: standard-version -s && babel src -o slick-loader-ie.min.js && browserify slick-loader-ie.min.js | uglifyjs > slick-loader.min.js && rm slick-loader-ie.min.js && jsdoc . -R README.md -c docs/jsdoc-conf.json && git add -A . && git commit -m 'chore: Docs generation'

author: Zenoo
